Class Trader

java.lang.Object
Trader
All Implemented Interfaces:
User
public class Trader
extends java.lang.Object
implements User
Trader class of E-shopping application. Implements User interface.

    • Trader

      public Trader​(int ID, java.lang.String password, java.lang.String name, java.io.File productFile, java.io.File orderFile)
      Initializes Trader object with given parameters.
      Parameters:
      ID - ID of the trader
      password - Password of the trader
      name - Name of the trader
      productFile - Contains product list that contains all products
      orderFile - Contains all orders given by customers

      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - When productFile is not valid

    • removeProduct

      public void removeProduct​(java.lang.String productID) throws java.io.IOException

      Parameters:

    • editProduct

      public void editProduct​(java.lang.String oldProductID, Product newProduct) throws java.io.IOException
      Changes information of the product with the given ID
      Parameters:
      oldProductID - ID of the product that will be edited
      newProduct - New data for the product
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - When product file is not valid

    • handleOrder

      public void handleOrder​(java.lang.String orderID, boolean cancel) throws java.io.IOException
      If the given order is belong to this trader's product, then handles the product by canceling or meeting the request.
      Parameters:
      orderID - ID of the product that is ordered
      cancel - Trader's decision on order
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - When file doesn't exist
